items.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If destroyed, the tile creature regains all its hit points and becomes active again in 24 hours unless at least half its tiles are collected and kept separate from the rest of the creature's tiles.

items.name: Narrow Dodge
entries: When targeted by a melee attack, the tile creature can take a reaction to turn its narrowest aspect toward the attacker. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll.

items.name: Water Breathing
entries: The troll can breathe underwater.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonfang can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonfang ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonfang makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonfang can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonfang has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonfang's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Dragonfang attacks twice with its shortsword.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has resistance.

action.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (2/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 50 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@dice 5d8}) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has damage resistance.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
entries: The dragonsoul has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}. While the dragonsoul can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonsoul ignores the effects of being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
entries: Once per turn, if the dragonsoul makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The dragonsoul can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dragonsoul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonsoul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Dragonsoul attacks twice with its shortsword.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has resistance.

action.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 90 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@dice 6d8}) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has damage resistance.

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: While Galvan is not presented in an encounter in {@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT}, the {@creature dragonsoul|RoT} stat block has been provided here for ease of use, with optional alterations for the {@item Blue Dragon Mask|RoTOS}.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Galvan has the {@item Blue Dragon Mask|RoTOS}.

items.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: While wearing no armor and wearing the Blue Dragon Mask, Galvan adds his Charisma bonus to her AC (included).

items.name: Lingering Shock
entries: If Galvan deals lightning damage to a creature while wearing the Blue Dragon Mask, that creature can't take reactions until its next turn.

items.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia)
entries: If Galvan fails a saving throw while wearing the Blue Dragon Mask, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The toad can breathe air or water.

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de fred. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: Iskander is presented in {@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT} as a neutral evil male human wizard. The {@creature mage} statblock has been provided here for ease of use.

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: Maccath the Crimson is presented in {@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT} as a female tiefling sorcerer and member of the Arcane Brotherhood. The {@creature mage} statblock, modified with tiefling racial traits, has been provided here for ease of use.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, Naergoth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Naergoth makes three attacks, either with his longsword or longbow. He can use Drenar Vida in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 5d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or se li redueixen tants punts de cop màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, o 10 ({@dice 1d10 + 5}) if used with two hands, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic.

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: Neronvain adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Magic can't put Neronvain to sleep.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Neronvain makes two attacks, either with his shortsword or Eldritch Arrow.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Eldritch Arrow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de força mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Poisonous Cloud (2/Day)
entries: Poison gas fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point Neronvain can see within 50 feet of him. The gas spreads around corners and remains until the start of Neronvain's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the gas must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Severin
senses: While wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen: visió fosca 60 peus

resist.preNote: While wearing the mask of the Dragon Queen:

immune.preNote: While wearing the mask of the Dragon Queen:

conditionImmune.preNote: While wearing the mask of the Dragon Queen:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Severin has the {@item Mask of the Dragon Queen|rot}.

trait.name: Draconic Majesty
entries: Severin adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

trait.name: Ignite Enemy
entries: If Severin deals fire damage to a creature while wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen, the target catches fire. At the start of each of its turns, the burning target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. A creature within abast of the fire can use an action to extinguish it.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (5/Dia)
entries: While wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen, if Severin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Burning Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Flaming Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 90 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}40 ({@damage 9d8}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Scorching Burst
entries: Severin chooses a point he can see within 60 feet of him. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de foc on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

If Severin is wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen, he can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options listed. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Severin regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Severin makes one attack.

legendary.name: Fiery Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Severin, along with any objects he is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Each creature within 5 feet of Severin before he teleports takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

legendary.name: Hellish Chains (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Severin targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target is wrapped in magical chains of fire and {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc at the start of each of its turns. At the end of its turns, the target can make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant if used with two hands, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Tiamat

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Tiamat can innately cast the following spell, her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}):

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (5/Dia)
entries: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Tiamat's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d6 + 10}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 25 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendaryHeader: Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

legendary.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d10 + 10}) de dany tallant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany d'àcid (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

legendary.name: Black Dragon Head: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes acid in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 ({@damage 15d8}) de dany d'àcid on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Blue Dragon Head: Lightning Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 ({@damage 16d10}) de dany elèctric on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Green Dragon Head: Poison Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 27} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) de dany de verí on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Red Dragon Head: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) de dany de foc on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tiamat breathes an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) de dany de fred on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: Varram is presented in {@adventure The Rise of Tiamat|RoT} as a male dwarf. The {@creature dragonsoul|RoT} statblock, modified with dwarf racial traits, has been provided here for ease of use.
